caption.p: Structure of SARS-CoV-2. SARS-CoV-2 has surface viral proteins, namely, spike glycoprotein (S), which mediates interaction with cell surface receptor ACE2. The viral membrane glycoprotein (M) and envelope (E) of SARS-CoV-2 are embedded in host membrane-derived lipid bilayer encapsulating the helical nucleocapsid comprising viral RNA
